Do you want to learn how to build an internal translation team?

We have the perfect webcast for you!

There are many reasons why a company may decide that the time is right to create an internal translation team. 
This could include: ‚úîÔ∏èa desire to maintain full control over the localization process, ‚úîÔ∏èa need to reduce deadlines to allow higher availability and coverage, ‚úîÔ∏èor a budgetary requirement to reduce spend with external language agencies. 
During this webinar recording, Jos√© Blanco, business consultant and co-founder of Locdep, will take you through the processes you need to consider when building your first translation function. Using his many years‚Äô experience advising companies on this area, topics covered include identifying when it makes business sense to make the move; how to attract the right talent; what systems and processes you need to put in place; common mistakes and pitfalls to avoid. 
The recording is in English. üîóTo watch this webcast click the link in the bio! Don't forget to sign up for our monthly newsletters to stay up to date with upcoming events and free webinars!‚Å£ ‚Å£‚Å£‚Å£

This webinar introduces the new, state-of-the-art neural machine translation (NMT) capabilities of SDL Machine Translation. Learn how this exciting new technology can help SDL Trados Studio users become even more productive whilst maintaining the quality demanded from customers. ‚Å£
‚Å£
Join Director of Product Management Daniel Brockmann and Product Marketing Manager Neil Ferguson who will guide you through: ‚Å£
‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èThe evolution of SDL Machine Translation ‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èWhat is Neural Machine Translation (NMT)‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èThe benefits of NMT for the whole supply chain‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èWorking with other resources ‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èA demo of how to use NMT in SDL Trados Studio‚Å£

‚Å£
üì¢During this recorded webcast, SDL‚Äôs Massimo Ghislandi and Daniel Brockmann will take you through how Trados has developed to meet the ever-changing needs of the translation industry, where we are today and where we see the future heading.‚Å£ ‚Å£
This is your opportunity to hear from the people who spearhead the development of SDL‚Äôs Translation Productivity solutions, including SDL Trados Studio, SDL Trados GroupShare and SDL Trados Business Manager.‚Å£ ‚Å£
The webcast is in English.‚Å£

Love from everyone at SDL Trados xox

Are you new to SDL Trados Studio 2019?‚Å£
‚Å£
We've got the perfect webinar for you to help you along your translation journey! ‚Å£
‚Å£
This webinar includes:‚Å£
‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èA brief introduction to the key translation resources when using SDL Trados Studio‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èA walk through of the Studio 2019 user interface‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èAn introduction to some of the new user experience enhancements in Studio 2019‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èHow to create and add a Translation Memory‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èHow to create and add a Termbase‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èGetting started with AutoSuggest 2.0 and Machine translation (MT)‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èSaving your translated file‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èGetting started with upLIFT‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èAnalysis reports ‚Äì measuring the value of your TM‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èReview features ‚Äì track changes/filters/export for revi‚Å£

Do you want to find out how a CAT (computer-assisted translation) Tool can help you!

This 30 minute video will give you a short introduction to CAT tools, where you will discover how this technology can make you more productive and help you to improve translation quality. We will also cover the basic principles of translation memory and terminology technology within SDL Trados Studio, with a short demonstration of the software. The video finishes with a short Q&A with our guest speaker. üîóTo watch this webcast click the link in the bio! Do you want to learn how LSPs can offer content authoring as an additional service?‚Å£
‚Å£
To stand out in today's competitive translation industry, LSPs often need to diversify or specialize their service in order to attract and retain key business. ‚Å£
‚Å£
One possible way to add further value to your service is through offering content authoring. This involves working with your client to optimize and reduce time spent preparing files for translation by helping them during source content creation.‚Å£
‚Å£
Our webcast presented by guest speaker Jos√© Blanco, co-founder and business consultant at Locdep, will help you learn how to sell this additional service. It includes:‚Å£
‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èAn introduction to content authoring‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èHow it will reduce costs and save time for both you and your client‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èPositioning the benefits to your clients, including return on investment (ROI) ‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èHow to offer content authoring for specific verticals or regulated industries‚Å£
‚Å£
Please note this webcast is delivered in English.‚Å£
‚Å£
üîóTo watch this webcast click the link in the bio! Don't forget to sign up for our monthly newsletters to stay up to date with upcoming events and free webinars!‚Å£ ‚Å£‚Å£‚Å£‚Å£‚Å£

üì¢Are you concerned that new technology and machine translation will make us jobless in the future? If so, you‚Äôre not alone. The demand for translation services is increasing, but the fees translators can demand are decreasing. How can you take advantage of your specialized skills and future-proof your business? üì¢How can you earn a satisfying income as a translator? The standard solution is to specialize in an area that requires human translation.

This presentation covers 4 paths that can help individual translators maintain or increase their rates and get more work. These paths are: ‚úîÔ∏èdifferentiation
‚úîÔ∏èspecialization
‚úîÔ∏èdiversification
‚úîÔ∏ècultivating your image and marketing

This webinar will be delivered in English. üîóTo join this webinar click the link in the bio! Don't forget to sign up for our monthly newsletters to stay up to date with upcoming events and free webinars!‚Å£ ‚Å£

‚Å£
üì¢Join Lydia Simplicio, Senior Global Business Consultant, and Marketing Director David Morgan, to learn more about what‚Äôs new in the latest version of our project management software, SDL Trados GroupShare 2020.‚Å£
‚Å£
This webcast explains how, by using GroupShare 2020, you can:‚Å£
‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èMake more informed business decisions by utilizing new business intelligence capabilities‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èBe more flexible in how you translate with the use of GroupShare‚Äôs new advanced online editing‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èImprove project management efficiency by reducing administration.‚Å£
‚Å£
This webcast is delivered in English.

‚Å£
üëçDirector of Product Management Daniel Brockmann and Product Marketing Manager Neil Ferguson will guide you through: ‚Å£

‚úîÔ∏èThe evolution of SDL Machine Translation ‚Å£

üëãWho is this webinar for? Translation professionals working in LSPs or in corporate translation departments.‚Å£
‚Å£
üëçJoin us as we show you how SDL Trados Business Manager can simplify and speed up the day-to-day tasks that go into running your business. Business Manager utilizes its tight integration with SDL Trados Studio to provide users with the ability to quickly and effectively organize jobs, take care of accounting tasks, report on your business performance, and have full visibility across your company.‚Å£
‚Å£
Through live demonstrations, this webinar will show how to:‚Å£
‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èManage your vendors and/or clients‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èCreate quotes using the direct integration with Studio 2019‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èGenerate purchase orders and invoices‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èUse reporting and dashboards to gain full visibility and control of job status, deadlines and payments. ‚Å£
‚Å£
We will also feature a look at the new customer and vendor portals which make the end-to-end translation process even simpler.‚Å£
‚Å£
üì¢This webinar will be delivered in English.‚Å£

‚úîÔ∏èHow to create a project quickly in one step, or apply refined settings to tailor a project to your requirements‚Å£

Alexandros Tsouris is an EN-EL, EL-EN Freelance Translator.‚Å£
‚Å£
Here's what he had to say about SDL Trados Studio:
‚Å£
"I was fascinated by the functionality of SDL Trados Studio during our training sessions for the certification exams. However, I couldn't possibly comprehend the extent of its usefulness. Now that I have started working with Studio, I have seen a huge difference in my productivity! Spending some time to properly prepare a project, building relevant termbases, leveraging translation memories and aligning legacy documents to build new ones, have made me much faster and more efficient."‚Å£

üëãThanks to SDL Trados Business Manager Lite, spreadsheets and calculators are now a thing of the past. Our business management tool will help you to manage all your client invoicing and quoting needs; by taking translation data directly from your projects you can speed up your invoicing processes and improve the accuracy of your quotes.‚Å£
‚Å£
‚úîÔ∏èFully integrated with SDL Trados Studio, the SDL Trados Business Manager Lite application will improve your cash flow by helping you keep track of your unpaid invoices, plus offer exciting insights such as who your highest spending clients are and which of your language pairs brings you the most revenue.‚Å£
